com.astamuse.asta4d.web.form.flow.classical

Interface OneStepFormHandlerTrait<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    All Superinterfaces:
    BasicFormFlowHandlerTrait<T>, CascadeArrayFunctions, FormFlowTraceDataAccessor, UpdatableFormFlowHandlerTrait<T>, ValidationProcessor

    public interface OneStepFormHandlerTrait<T>
extends UpdatableFormFlowHandlerTrait<T>
    This trait represents a classical one step form flow which contains only one input step. The developers are required to at least implement the following methods:
    • BasicFormFlowHandlerTrait.getFormCls()
    • BasicFormFlowHandlerTrait.createInitForm()
    • UpdatableFormFlowHandlerTrait.updateForm(Object)
    The target template file for input could be specified in the URL rule by the fixed name of VAR_INPUT_TEMPLATE_FILE.

    Also, ValidationProcessor.getTypeUnMatchValidator() and ValidationProcessor.getValueValidator() are recommended to be overridden by a common parent class to perform validator configuration.

    Author:
    e-ryu

      • skipStoreTraceData

        default boolean skipStoreTraceData(String currentStep,
                                   String renderTargetStep,
                                   FormFlowTraceData traceData)
        In the parent class BasicFormFlowHandlerTrait's implementation of skipSaveTraceMap, it says that the sub class have the responsibility to make sure save the trace map well, thus we override it to perform the obligation.

        The trace map will never be saved for a one step form since there is no necessary to keep the trace

        Specified by:
